EmailTemplate.description: CS sales resources for loan partners
EmailTemplate.name: 18-05 CS Sales Support
EmailTemplate.subject: We want to make Community Solar an easy sell.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We want to make Community Solar an Easy Sell.
We want to support you as you unlock the benefits of selling Community Solar to your customers.
To support your sales, please make use of the resources listed below. Shared Collateral Library: Access a library of collateral for your customers including brochures, a contract overview, high-res project photos, an intro video, and more!
Training Guide: You can always reference the guide BlueWave provided in the same folder as our shared marketing collateral. Plus, we can set up additional trainings as needed with your team.
Launch Events: Talk to our Marketing Team to discuss co-branded launch events with your team.
Field Support: We know that selling Community Solar is new to you, so we have a Partner Support team standing by to answer any questions you have or to join you in the field to answer your customers' questions.
Thank you for working with us to revolutionize energy,
- All of us here at BlueWave
